sentences.en: In 1898 he identified what he termed the "internal reticular apparatus"; the identification of this structure, which would later be named the Golgi complex, was a major breakthrough in cytology.
sentences.cn: 1898年，他鉴别出了被他命名为“细胞内部的网状结构”的结构；对于这一结构——现在被称为高尔基体——的鉴别，是细胞学上一个重大的突破。

sentences.en: Objective: To evaluate the applicability of Conjunctival Impression Cytology ( CIC ) to the diagnosis of dry eye.

sentences.en: Thus, the construction of the brain and the cytology, biophysics, and biochemistry of its component neurons reflect its fundamental function—to mediate behavior.
